title: Understanding Therapeutic Relationships
text: A therapeutic relationship is more than just a professional interaction. It involves building a connection based on trust and respect.

title: Key Elements of a Therapeutic Relationship
text: Consider the elements that are essential for a therapeutic relationship: trust, respect, empathy, and a focus on the client's well-being.

hintAnswer: a healthy relationship that develops over time, and is based on mutual trust and respect. In the relationship, there is a nurturing of health, hope, wellness, empathy, and therapeutic interventions to help the client through their current encounter
title: Characteristics of a Therapeutic Relationship
text: What are the characteristics that define a therapeutic relationship?
choices: a healthy relationship that develops over time, and is based on mutual trust and respect. In the relationship, there is a nurturing of health, hope, wellness, empathy, and therapeutic interventions to help the client through their current encounter
a casual interaction with no specific goals
a relationship based on authority and control
a temporary interaction with no emotional involvement
